text: Beaumont is a city in Riverside County, California, United States. The population was 53,036 at the 2020 census. This is up from 11,384 in 2000. == References == == Other websites == *Official website *San Gorgonio Pass Historical Society *Beaumont Unified School District website Category:1912 establishments in California Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Riverside County, California
title: Beaumont, California
